cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to a negative value will cause thread allocation errors and prevent proper PUSCH processing.

du.explanation_en: Setting maxMIMO_layers to zero will disable MIMO functionality and cause radio link failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 maxMIMO_layers 設定為零會停用 MIMO 功能，並導致無線鏈路故障。
